windows users

press windows key and type 'run' and press enter

type into the run dialog 'shell:common startup' and press enter


this opens the correct folder to place startup items

example given: C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\Windows\Start Menu\Programs\Startup


put 'starthidden.cmd' in that folder so the flask server will always run when you log in

don't forget to edit the paths to point to the appropriate locations


example given: my username is 'user' and i put the folder containing this flask app in my user folder
